scripts.bumpSnapshot: npm version prerelease --preid=SNAPSHOT && yarn run postversion
scripts.updateAlpha__: ssh -t docker@$npm_package_config_alphaHost "cd $npm_package_config_alphaFolder ; docker-compose pull && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d"
scripts.restartAlpha: ssh -t docker@$npm_package_config_alphaHost "cd $npm_package_config_alphaFolder ; docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d"
scripts.pushBuildToAlpha: ssh -t docker@$npm_package_config_alphaHost "cd $npm_package_config_alphaFolder ; rm -rf docs/* " ;  scp -r dist/* docker@$npm_package_config_alphaHost:$npm_package_config_alphaFolder/docs/
scripts.publishAlpha: yarn run postversion && yarn run extractfrom:docker && yarn run pushBuildToAlpha && yarn run restartAlpha
scripts.postversion: echo Postversionhook && rm .version && rm .githash && sed '/^.*"version":.*$/d' package.json > .package.json.without.version && echo $npm_package_version && echo $npm_package_version > .version && git rev-parse HEAD > .githash
scripts.postbuild: ls -d build > /dev/null && git rev-parse --short HEAD && echo $npm_package_version && git rev-parse --short HEAD > build/githash && echo $npm_package_version > build/version
scripts.build:docker: VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker build --progress=auto -t cismet/$npm_package_name -t cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION .
scripts.extractfrom:docker: yarn run build:docker; rm -rf dist; VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; DOCKERID=$(docker create cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION); docker cp $DOCKERID:/usr/share/nginx/html .; mv html dist ; docker rm -v $DOCKERID
scripts.publish:docker: yarn run build:docker; VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker tag cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION $npm_package_config_dockerRegistryPath/$npm_package_name:$VERSION && docker push $npm_package_config_dockerRegistryPath/$npm_package_name:$VERSION
